Two users shared the same prime while generating their RSA keys. Their messages became entwined—a weakness you can use to recover the secret: 3504612751295850579979993769692123089692379246229078639475885837399082574757514800135283193577164478284061377582378561986655863860856690851395654374512786

The flag format is flag{...}
n=4532338711350574356885324557917585503921320044717201022519845862886345940347059371877551039321948029560594109553301986248869320792221411421220431520914699, n2=5972566914238289874807039290736362028590957347098358813805814667350116583983596681648854512703905015810103841587314854184735082155440145614863972767566963, e=179497809026778382008218168406630600925812763850525041677266569173858670213019293634689594222281737239738051553088968544041566494815417372685056347634177

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{q4umscch}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 3504612751295850579979993769692123089692379246229078639475885837399082574757514800135283193577164478284061377582378561986655863860856690851395654374512786
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=4532338711350574356885324557917585503921320044717201022519845862886345940347059371877551039321948029560594109553301986248869320792221411421220431520914699, n2=5972566914238289874807039290736362028590957347098358813805814667350116583983596681648854512703905015810103841587314854184735082155440145614863972767566963, e=179497809026778382008218168406630600925812763850525041677266569173858670213019293634689594222281737239738051553088968544041566494815417372685056347634177
extra_info: p=72204251890635559667488857981520814091230126388136901833294693162861807142473, q=62771077778293418885869923946408302795613306223543165407164575467050829789363, q2=82717662157689282651892352421492942051978466509925315655643370451837343911131, φ(n)=4532338711350574356885324557917585503921320044717201022519845862886345940346924396547882110343394670778666180436415142816257640724980952152590518883982864, φ(n2)=5972566914238289874807039290736362028590957347098358813805814667350116583983441759734806187861585634599700827831171645591837019937951207551249273616513360
